function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid deployment of pop-up facilities for community wide-spread nasal and throat swab testing","Impact":"Risk of close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases in pop-up testing facilities","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures and use well-ventilated spaces for testing facilities","Technologies":"Air purification systems, touchless equipment, and remote monitoring technology","People":"Community members visiting testing facilities, healthcare workers at the testing facilities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and compartmentalized spaces in communal facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in communal facilities such as schools, community centers, and healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Reassess and update design standards for better ventilation and flexible room design to allow for social distancing if required","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, flexible room dividers, and air quality monitoring systems","People":"Students, patients, visitors, and staff in communal facilities","Owner":"Government authorities, facility management, and architects/engineers"}]}
